subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Mavericks are still in a precarious spot, trailing the eighth-seeded Warriors by 3-2, with Game 6 in Oakland on Thursday. But no one has to wonder any more when Dirk Nowitzki will join the fray.
snippet: The Mavericks are still in a precarious spot, trailing the eighth-seeded Warriors by 3-2, with Game 6 in Oakland on Thursday. But no one has to wonder any more when Dirk Nowitzki will join the fray.
